meanings.definition: A salt or ester of bisulfuric acid.
meanings.sent1: I added bisulfate to the solution to create a chemical reaction.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the properties of bisulfate in the laboratory.
meanings.sent3: The bisulfate walked into the beaker and said, 'I'm feeling salty today!'
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of bisulfate was as deep as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The bright white color of bisulfate stood out against the dark background.

meanings.definition: A compound containing the HSO4- ion.
meanings.sent1: The formula of this compound includes bisulfate as a key component.
meanings.sent2: The bisulfate ion plays a crucial role in the chemical reaction.
meanings.sent3: The bisulfate ion joked with the chloride ion, 'We make quite an electrifying pair!'
meanings.sent4: Her understanding of the bisulfate ion was like a lightbulb turning on.
meanings.sent5: The bisulfate ion danced around the solution, creating a vibrant display.
